intro: Nogo, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the genus Saintpaulia and is characterized by its velvety, waxy leaves and showy, clustered flowers. The plant prefers bright, indirect light and well-draining soil to prevent root rot. Its compact growth habit makes it a popular choice for indoor gardening. Nogo is known for its ability to bloom throughout the year under proper care.
